mapper.select: SELECT /* BDCFaqMapper.getFaqListCnt */ COUNT(*) FROM BD_FAQ_MST A WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT /* BDCFaqMapper.selectFaqDtl */ FAQ_SEQ , CTGRY_CD , TITL , CNTN , FILE_SEQ , EXPS_YN , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME , REG_IP , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME , MOD_IP , MOD_DTM FROM BD_FAQ_MST A WHERE FAQ_SEQ = #{detailsKey}

SELECT /* BDCFaqMapper.selectFaqFileList */ A.FAQ_SEQ , B.FILE_ORD , B.FILE_SEQ , B.FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT FAQ_SEQ, FILE_SEQ FROM BD_FAQ_MST WHERE EXPS_YN = 'Y' ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FILE_ORD , FILE_SEQ , ORGN_FILE_NM AS FILE_NAME FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ) B ON A.FILE_SEQ = B.FILE_SEQ
